summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of alley between Blocks 5 and 6, Evans & Blewett Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue West and 5th Avenue West, from West Crockett Street to West McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92620, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
